screen.statuemenus.style.strawstatues.cr: Makes the statue show as if it were crouching.
screen.statuemenus.style.strawstatues.dy: Have the statue automatically resolve to the current skin of the targeted player. Otherwise the player skin at the time it is set is kept forever.
screen.statuemenus.style.strawstatues.pu: Allows other entities to push the statue around. This enables it to enter vehicles such as minecarts and boats.
screen.statuemenus.style.strawstatues.se: Disallows changing equipment and opening this menu in survival mode.
screen.statuemenus.style.strawstatues.sl: Makes the statue's arms appear less wide.
screen.statuemenus.style.strawstatues.sm: Makes the statue half it's size like a baby mob.
screen.strawstatues.model_parts.tooltip: Set a player name to take the statue skin from.
